'''1.10.0.7''' is a major update for the [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s, released on March 19, 2019, that updates the servers for [[Bedrock Edition 1.10.0]].

== Changes ==
; [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s
* Updated for 1.10.0 clients.

== Reclient ==
A Reclient of this version was released on March 27, 2019 which updates for 1.10.1.

=== Changes ===
;[[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s
* Updated for 1.10.1 clients.
